title: Here’s Exactly Where to Get Baby Archie’s Blue and White Striped Overalls
text:
We woke up to some major royal news this morning: Archie Harrison Mountbatten-Windsor embarked on his first official royal outing alongside his parents.

During day three of their royal tour of Africa, the Duke and Duchess of Sussex brought little Archie to meet famed activist Archbishop Desmond Tutu and his daughter, Thandeka Tutu-Gxashe, in Cape Town.

And although it’s pretty clear he gets his dashing good looks from his father (these photos prove it), baby Archie definitely gets his fashion sense from his mom, Meghan Markle, who has been touring in style.

Archie turned heads in a white T-shirt, blue pinstripe overalls from H&M Baby and matching booties.

One word: adorable.

And the overalls are from H&M Baby and retail for only $20. We’re serious.

The best part? They’re still available online.

Buy now
